mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, board_num, board_title, board_readcount from (select * from board where board_lev=1 order by board_readcount desc)) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <=3
select COUNT(*) from board where board_lev = 1

select * from (select rownum rnum, board.* from (select * from board order by board_ref desc, board_reply_ref desc, board_lev asc, board_reply_seq asc)board) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set board_readcount = board_readcount + 1 where board_num = #{ board_num }
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_num, board_writer, board_title, board_content, board_original_filename, board_rename_filename, board_ref, board_reply_ref, board_lev, board_reply_seq, board_readcount, board_date) values((select max(board_num)+1 from board), #{board_writer}, #{board_title}, #{board_content},null,null, #{board_ref},(select max(board_num)+1 from board),2, #{board_reply_seq},default,sysdate)
